name: An Interesting Safe
description:
A limited scope puzzle game made for a jam in 2021.

You've heard stories of a safe with seemingly broken buttons, but you're sure there has to be a way in! Take on the role of an experienced thief and safe cracker in this 5-15 minute puzzle game. 

You can interact with the buttons by clicking and progress the dialog with space or by clicking the dialog box. 

If you enjoyed the game consider supporting me on Ko-fi or following me on twitter or right here on Itch.io if you want to stay updated with my projects.
